name: Improvised Explosives
description: A number of improvised explosives are marked on the map. Each one is a Size 1/2 object with Evasion 5 and E-Defense 5 that explodes with a Burst 1 area upon taking any damage or heat. All characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take 2d6 explosive damage. On a success, they take half damage.

name: Fuel Tanks
description: A number of fuel tanks are marked on the map. Each one is a Size 1 object with Evasion 5 and E-Defense 5 that explodes with a Burst 1 area upon taking any damage or heat. All characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take 2d6 explosive damage. On a success, they take half damage. The affected area then becomes a patch of burning fuel that counts as dangerous terrain that inflicts 5 Burn. Objects and terrain within the affected area are completely destroyed.
